thread.title_full: Candidates for Charleston City Council, District 9 - Post and Courier

author: postandcourier.com
text:
Aubry Alexander × Aubry Alexander Age: 62
Residence: Huntington Woods, West Ashley
Occupation: Real Estate broker
 political science, Baptist College at Charleston
 2007
Contact information: (843) 810-2853, aubryalexander9@gmail.com , voteaubry.com
 Reading, fishing, and an occasional round of golf at Muni
 Residents know I listen to them, respond to them and provide responsible, reasonable and reliable leadership. My business experience and community involvement aid the success.
 Enhancing West Ashley’s quality of life and growing Charleston’s economy will continue to be my top priorities. You need both to happen simultaneously.
Peter Shahid Age: 60
Residence: Northbridge subdivision
Occupation: Attorney, manager of The Shahid Group, LLC, a real estate investment company
Education: Bachelor’s degree and law degree, University of South Carolina
 323-6474, peter@shahidforcharleston.com , www.shahidforcharleston.com
 Reading presidential biographies, jogging, boating and walking my Lab, A.J.
 Most importantly, I love our city and have a new vision for West Ashley. I possess a positive record as a community leader, successful business person, federal prosecutor and attorney.
 West Ashley has been ignored. I will seek to revitalize West Ashley, including developing Citadel Mall and implementing a comprehensive plan to ensure the efficient flow of traffic and people.
